thread.title: What a great find...look no further!
thread.title_full: What a great find...look no further! - Review of Holiday Inn NYC - Lower East Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: janet2801
title: What a great find...look no further!
text:
I am so glad I booked this hotel. It's located Ina lively part of the city with lots of eating options of all price ranges nearby. The rooms are actually a good size by New York standards & spotlessly clean. The staff are a credit to the brand too, I had a couple of technical issues with my tv & safe & they sent someone within 10 mins & he fixed everything. The walls are a little thin but I was lucky to stay mid week so no other guests were having parties sets so it was pretty quiet. I really can not recommend the hotel enough, especially for the price. If I had to give a negative it's that there is no refrigerator in the room (but have ice vending machines) but maybe that's an American thing, not just this hotel. I plan on making this my future base for all New York visits. Thank you!
Green Features: Towel & linen conservation, but a lot of plastic used on cups etc...better to have cups/glasses & wash them
